definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
to drift with the waves and go with the flow (idiom); to follow the crowd blindly
to drift with the waves and yield to the flow (idiom); to follow the crowd blindly

sentences.english: The big ship is sailing with the wind .
sentences.chinese: 大船在暴风雨的海上随波起伏。

sentences.english: In May, the ice breaks up and is washed away into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 到了五月，冰层就会破裂，随波至大海。

sentences.english: For my loved ones. I could not go down with those waves.
sentences.chinese: 我不能随波浮沉，为了我致爱的亲人。

sentences.english: Let those expectations of reward and praise float away with the waves.
sentences.chinese: 让那些对于表扬和嘉奖的期望随波漂逝。

sentences.english: The drift line is littered with objects abandoned by the waves.
sentences.chinese: 漂流线当作目标被随意的放着并随波起伏。

sentences.english: I cannot along with the wave vicissitude, for I send the family member who loves.
sentences.chinese: 我不能随波浮沉，为了我致爱的亲人。

sentences.english: Fishing boats and vehicles were carried ashore at Onahama port in Iwaki city.
sentences.chinese: 盘成郡的小名滨港口的渔船和车辆随波漂流。

sentences.english: Our boat rocked to and fro on the waves.
sentences.chinese: 我们的船随波摆来摆去。

sentences.english: No longer caring if we drift or go straight.
sentences.chinese: 不再关心我们是随波漂流，还是一路直行。

sentences.english: My heart, where the long years of your moonlight rippling the waves.
sentences.chinese: 我的心，在有你的月光里漫漫随波荡漾。

definition: variant of 飄盪|飘荡[piao1 dang4]
spray/ocean spray/spindrift/fig. happenings from one's life/CL:朵[duo3]
to beat against the shore (of waves)
gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
